title: Ticket #3705: EC2 jobs lost track of their instance ID during recovery
description:
During failure recovery, the gridmanager can lose track of the instance IDs of previously-submitted jobs.

The problem happens in EC2Job when m_remoteJobId is passed to SetInstanceId(), which modifies m_remoteJobId.
